name: Cron Service
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active cron || echo skip; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service cron status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running && echo active || echo skip; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart cron || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service cron restart || true; fi
